title: Thunderbirds in outer space
brief_description: The Tracy boys, Brains and the rest of the Thunderbirds are called into action to save the Earth from a fiery meteorite of destruction and a runaway rocket carrying three astronauts headed for collision with the sun. Special effects provided by Derek Meddings and Brian Johnson and based on an original format by Gerry and Sylvia Anderson.
